service.title: About the Service
service.content: Beyond is a platform that allows you to preserve and transmit your memories, messages, and wishes to your loved ones. The service is provided as is, and we strive to ensure its availability and security within reasonable technical limits.

account.title: Your Account
account.content: You are responsible for the confidentiality of your login credentials. Any activity from your account is your responsibility. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

content.title: Your Content
content.content: You retain all rights to the content you add to Beyond. You warrant that you have the necessary rights to this content and that it does not violate any laws. We claim no rights to your content and use it only to provide you with the service.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Beyond does its best to ensure service security and availability, but cannot guarantee 100% uptime. We are not responsible for data loss due to events beyond our control (natural disasters, major infrastructure failures, etc.).

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: You may delete your account at any time from your settings. We reserve the right to suspend or close an account in case of violation of these terms or service abuse.

disclaimer.title: Legal Disclaimer
disclaimer.intro: It's important to understand what Beyond is and what it is not. Here are some essential points to know before using our service.

notLegal.title: Beyond is not a legal service
items: This is not a will or official legal document
Beyond does not replace notary or attorney services
Content you create on Beyond has no legal value for your estate
For official documents concerning your inheritance, estate, or succession, consult a legal professional

privacy.title: Data Protection
items: Your content is end-to-end encrypted — no one, not even us, can read it
We never sell your data to third parties
You maintain full control: you can modify or delete your content at any time
We are GDPR compliant and respect your privacy

responsibility.title: Your Responsibility
items: You are responsible for the content you add to Beyond
Ensure your content does not violate any laws (defamation, copyright, etc.)
Do not share illegal, hateful, or harmful content
Verify that you have the rights to photos, videos, or documents you upload

technical.title: Technical Limitations
items: Beyond is an online service that requires an internet connection
We do our best to ensure service availability, but interruptions may occur
We recommend keeping a local copy of your most important content
Supported file formats may evolve over time

overseer.title: Choosing a Trusted Overseer
items: The overseer you designate will have access to your content according to the rules you define
Choose someone you trust absolutely
Clearly explain their role and your wishes regarding content transmission
You can change your overseer at any time from your settings

dataCollection.title: Data Collected
items: Account information: email, first name, last name, profile photo (optional)
Content you create: letters, messages, photos, videos, documents
Technical information: connection logs, IP address, browser type
Cookies strictly necessary for service operation

dataUse.title: Data Usage
items: Provide and improve the Beyond service
Authenticate you and secure your account
Send you important notifications about your account
Comply with our legal obligations

encryption.title: Encryption and Security
items: All your content is end-to-end encrypted with industry-standard algorithms
Your passwords are hashed with bcrypt — we cannot read them
Communications between your browser and our servers are secured by HTTPS
We conduct regular security audits

rights.title: Your Rights (GDPR)
items: Right of access: you can view all your data
Right to rectification: you can modify your information at any time
Right to erasure: you can delete your account and all your data
Right to portability: you can export your data in a standard format

retention.title: Data Retention
items: Your data is retained as long as your account is active
If you delete your account, all your data is deleted within 30 days
Technical logs are retained for a maximum of 12 months for security reasons
Backups are automatically deleted after 90 days

cookies.title: Cookies
items: We only use cookies essential to service operation (session, authentication)
We do not use advertising or tracking cookies
You can configure your browser to refuse cookies, but some features may not work

subProcessors.title: Sub-processors
subProcessors.intro: We use trusted sub-processors to operate the service. All are GDPR-compliant and bound by data processing agreements:
items: Neon (neon.tech) — PostgreSQL database hosted in the European Union. Stores your account information (encrypted at rest)
Cloudflare R2 (cloudflare.com) — File storage with AES-256-GCM encryption. Your media is client-side encrypted before transfer
Redis/Upstash (upstash.com) — Task queue for notifications. No personal data is permanently stored
subProcessors.dpa: We have signed Data Processing Agreements (DPAs) with each of these sub-processors in accordance with GDPR Article 28.
